channel.title: Fail to run any client
channel.description:
Any client I ever download, it does not run.
example.
@echo off cd ./locandclass/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_04\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m client 10 0 highmem members 32 pause
error.
Error: Could not find or load main class client Press any key to continue . . .
This happens for every client i ever use, but all servers work.... WHY?

item.title: Fail to run any client
item.dc:creator: @demoniczerk demoniczerk
item.description:
@demoniczerk wrote:

I was having the same problem.
The following should work.

@echo off cd ./locandclass/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_04\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp .; client 10 0 highmem members 32 pause

Read full topic

item.title: Fail to run any client
item.dc:creator: @holylouis holylouis
item.description:
@holylouis wrote:

what jdk version you have and also what version of client/server u using like 317,474 etc…

Read full topic

item.title: Fail to run any client
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

Any client I ever download, it does not run.

example.

@echo off
cd ./locandclass/
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_04\bin\java.exe” -Xmx512m client 10 0 highmem members 32
pause

error.

Error: Could not find or load main class client
Press any key to continue . . .

This happens for every client i ever use, but all servers work… WHY?

Read full topic
